mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_question ( type, pname, details, uname, telnumber, statu,creatby ) VALUES (#{type},#{pname},#{details},#{uname},#{telnumber},#{statu},#{creatby})
mapper.select: SELECT q.id, type, pname, uname, telnumber FROM tb_question q LEFT JOIN tb_answer a ON q.id = a.qid WHERE a.lid = #{id} AND q.statu = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_question SET statu = - 1 WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE tb_question SET statu = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, type, pname, details, uname, answer, frequency FROM tb_question WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_question SET answer = #{answer},statu = 2 WHERE id = #{id}
